section.title: Charset definition
section.p: DITA-OT supports defining the code reference target file encoding using the format attribute. The supported format is:
If charset is not defined system default charset will be used. If charset is not recognized or supported, DOTJ052E error is thrown and system default charset is used as a fall-back.

section.title: Line range extraction
section.p: Code reference can extract only a given line ranges with line-range pointer in the URI fragment. The format is:
Start and end line numbers start from 1 and are inclusive. If end range is omitted, range ends in last line of the file.

example.p: Only lines from 5 to 10 will be included in the output.
